CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The target poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) was obtained by Suzuki polymerization of M1 and M2 in degassed toluene / water with K 3 PO 4 as an organic base , Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 as a catalyst , and P(o-tol) 3 as the corresponding ligand at 90 °C for 3 days.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT)
2. M1
3. M2
4. K3PO4
5. Pd2(dba)3
6. P(o-tol)3

These are the names of the materials used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT)
2. M1
3. M2

These are the three material names mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities, K3PO4, Pd2(dba)3, and P(o-tol)3, are not material names, but rather chemicals used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT) |
| M1 |
| M2 |

Note that I've preserved the capitalization and formatting of the material names as they appear in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The target poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) was obtained by Suzuki polymerization of M1 and M2 in degassed toluene / water with K 3 PO 4 as an organic base , Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 as a catalyst , and P(o-tol) 3 as the corresponding ligand at 90 °C for 3 days.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. M1 and M2 - These are the monomers used to synthesize the target polymer PCDSeBT.
2. K3PO4 - This is the organic base used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
3. Pd2(dba)3 - This is the catalyst used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
4. P(o-tol)3 - This is the ligand used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
5. 90°C - This is the temperature at which the Suzuki polymerization reaction was carried out.
6. 3 days - This is the duration for which the Suzuki polymerization reaction was carried out.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

* M1 and M2 (monomers)
* K3PO4 (organic base)
* Pd2(dba)3 (catalyst)
* P(o-tol)3 (ligand)
* 90°C (temperature)
* 3 days (duration)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCDSeBT - This is the target polymer that is being synthesized, and its properties are being described.
2. 90°C - This is the temperature at which the Suzuki polymerization reaction was carried out, which could affect the properties of the resulting polymer.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

* PCDSeBT
* 90°C

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the table with the valid entities in the given paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| 90°C |
